name: Lockshot - Categories Game
description:
Lockshot is a new awesome way to share pictures with your friends: take a photo, lock it and send it to your friends! You have 3 ways of locking the picture:
• NORMAL: Your friends reveal the photo by tapping on it.
• SECRET: Set a question and let your friends unlock your picture only if they find the answer.
• PRIVATE: Your friends can only unlock it with their fingerprint or private passcode!

Start sending secret photos to your friends now! Entirely FREE!
